ygData.subject: Re: LD & items lost
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. It s a magi summoned bag tat disappears when u logout or LD (link dead), and anything inside will diappear too when the bag vanish. 2. U r lucky that u
ygData.messageBody:
1. It's a magi summoned bag tat disappears when u logout or LD (link dead),
and anything inside will diappear too when the bag vanish.

2. U r lucky that u havent encounter LD yet, but sooner or later u will get
it.

3. Just an example how how LD hurts:
a. Tat day I show YY the ring, earring and brac that Kell sold to me.
After YY finished examing them I cancel the trade window. Since I have 7
bags and the last slot is filled with something, the jewelry all drop into
my 1st bag. Fair enough, I open the 1st bag and re-equip them. I put on
the 1st ring, and kena LD b4 I put on the 2nd piece of jewelry. DOH, when
I try to relogin, I get the error msg "Zone not available". When I restart
my PC and login, I noticed I was timewarpped abit and all the 3 jewelry r
gone, including the ring tat I've already equip on my char! According to
Garren, he also kena LD and unable to login immediately due to the same
error msg at that time. H/w, only me kena the item lost. Call GM and none
reply, as usual. ;(
b. Another time I was hunting wisps at WC. Suddenly an adult kod spawn
when my mana is only 1/3 left. I fight till OOM and decided to flee to
zone. While running, I LD. Re-login and find myself naked, so it mean I
was killed when LD. Nmind, that's not the worst part. I try to find my
corpse where I last LD but cannot find! I cant be missing the place as
it's pretty near zone and I'm quite familiar with the place. No choice
have to shout for help. A dwarven cleric who know me since newbie come to
help me by lenting me the wand tat point to my corpse. Funny thing is that
my corpse lied pretty far from where I last died. According to me dwarven
friend, it's a bug. When u run and LD, sometime ya body 'continue' to fly
after u LD and that's why my corpse was found quite a distance from where I
last remembered.
c. Last night I was soloing at HH. Killed an white orc (obvious xp rise),
found a ring cape and happily go near zone and med. Suddenly LD and when I
login, the ring cape is gone and my xp return to b4 I kill the orc. The
only thing good is tat when I LD, I left less than 50% HP and oom, when I
relogin I'm full, just like the stats b4 I hunt the orc, sigh.

So another problem with soloing is that if u LD, no one will know or can
take care of u.

Zil


On Friday, 09 July, 1999 12:29 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> where the hell did u managed to find em? from some creature? or u buy
from

> freeport... :) sounds useful... since i have yet to get disconnected from
> the eq server...
>
> Nic
> p/s : dont listen to em saying u can get 10pp in 10 mins... dont get ya
> hopes too high... i would say 10-20pp in 1 hour is reasonable... n more
if u
> r fast... still good money fer a starter...
